title: FINAL PRICE DROP   FS Young portrait SGC30 slip error
author: FrankWakefield

posts.post_title: FINAL PRICE DROP   FS Young portrait SGC30 slip error
posts.post_content:
For sale...

white border T206 of Cy Young, portrait. SGC 30.
This card is a Sweet Caporal series 350, Factory 25. The Factory 25 cards are a bit more difficult to locate.

I've had questions about the slip which says Piedmont...   SGC got it wrong.

**** SOLD *****   white border T206 of Bill O'Hara, St. Louis SGC 10.

*IMPORTANT* please communicate with emails to [url]fwakefield1@comcast.net[/url]
emails or messages through the board may be ignored.

Young, $825, delivered. 

SOLD  O'Hara, $875, delivered.

Paypal is fine. Money orders and checks are fine, too.

At this point in time I'm considering best offers. Email directly, please don't message me through the board. 

Thanks. Frank Wakefield

Bump for price cuts and to consider best offers.
Bump for explaining that SGC's slip doesn't match card back, for price drop, and because the O'Hara is now sold.  Thank you for looking.
Final bump for final price reduction on the Young card.
